overview.base: You can hear all moving creatures within 30 feet. If the creature is breathing, you can hear it even if it is not moving. You can not detect @L[Condition:Silent]{silent} creatures in this way.

You can passively smell the types of all living creatures within 30 feet. You can detect dead and undead creatures as well, but you cannot distinguish within or between them. They all smell like death. You also gain @L[Ability:Scent Seeing]{Scent Seeing}. You can not detect @L[Condition:Odorless]{odorless} creatures in this way.

You know the exact location of all target creatures. You continue to know the location of all targets within 10 feet, whether they are or you are moving or not, so long as they are still within 10 feet of you.

system.requirements: You are not @L[Condition:Anosmatic]{anosmatic} and the target is not @L[Condition:Odorless]{odorless}.

overview.base:
Note: A target moving due to Battle Charge can still provoke reactions like @L[Ability:Opportunity Attack]{Opportunity Attack}.
Note: This ability can trigger in the middle of @L[Ability:Move]{moving}. You could approach an enemy, trigger this ability, take an @L[Ability:Opportunity Attack]{Opportunity Attack} against them, keep moving towards them, and trigger this ability again.

results.hit: Target moves 10 feet away from you.
results.critHit: Target moves 20 feet away from you.

system.trigger: Moving at least 10 feet in a straight line towards the target and becoming adjacent to them.

overview.base: You gain 15 @L[Core:Temporary Hit Points]{temporary HP} and become @L[Condition:Frenzied]{frenzied}.
overview.proficient: You gain an additional 5 × @L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{P} @L[Core:Temporary Hit Points]{temporary HP} and gain @L[Ability:Fast]{Fast}.
overview.fluent: You instead gain an additional 5 × @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{F} @L[Core:Temporary Hit Points]{temporary HP} and gain @L[Ability:Swift]{Swift}.

system.endCondition: You die or 1 minute passes without combat.

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Improved Strength]{Improved Strength} and @L[Ability:Melee Damage Boost]{Melee Damage Boost}. In addition, you are no longer suffer the consequences of @L[Property:Cumbersome]{cumbersome} items.
You gain @L[Ability:Beastly Strength]{Beastly Strength} and @L[Ability:Improved Armor Piercing]{Improved Armor Piercing}.

Can wield @L[Property:Two-Handed]{two-handed} weapons in one hand.
Note: @L[Property:AP]{AP} weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be @L[Property:AV0]{AV0}.
Melee weapons you use are @L[Property:Armor Piercing]{armor piercing}.
You may spend an unused @L[Core:Active Maneuvers]{action} to @L[Keyword:Boosted]{boost} the triggering @L[Core:Damage]{damage}.
overview.proficient: You may spend an additional unused @L[Core:Active Maneuvers]{action} to @L[Keyword:Boosted]{boost} the triggering @L[Core:Damage]{damage} again.

system.trigger: You have hit a creature with a @L[Category:Damaging effects]{damaging} melee @L[Category:Weapon delivery abilities]{weapon} @L[Category:Attack abilities]{attack}.

results.critHit: If you want, target takes @L[Core:Damage]{standard damage} as well.

overview.base: Note: A target moving due to Knockback can still provoke reactions like @L[Ability:Opportunity Attack]{Opportunity Attack}.

results.hit: Target moves 10 feet away from you.
results.critHit: Target moves 20 feet away from you.

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Offensive Martial Arts]{Offensive Martial Arts} and @L[Ability:Defensive Martial Arts]{Defensive Martial Arts}.

Your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands} count as @L[Category:Weapons]{weapons} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Attack Interaction]{attack} with them and their damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].

Your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands} count as @L[Category:Shields]{shields} for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Block Interaction]{block} with them and their @L[Core:Block Value]{BV} is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands @L[Property:Blocking]{blocking}.
You cannot use items in your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands}.
Note: A target moving due to Battle Charge can still provoke reactions like @L[Ability:Opportunity Attack]{Opportunity Attack}.

system.trigger: Moving at least 10 feet in a straight line towards the target and becoming adjacent to them.
